articles.title: Commentary: Southeast Asia is buckling under a second year of COVID-19 - CNA
articles.description: COVID-19 is a sustained test of state capacity, and Southeast Asian countries are faring poorly, says a doctor.
articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR: The second year of the COVID-19 pandemic has not been kind to Southeast Asian countries. The region is experiencing accelerated national-level tragedies played out in accelerated speed.… [+5242 chars]

articles.title: Surfside condo collapse: Montreal woman came for vacation with friend who was visiting father - WPLG Local 10
articles.description: Two best friends from college take a trip to Surfside from Montreal to visit one of the girls' parents. Anastasia Gromova is the latest victim to be identified in the tragic collapse of the Champlain Towers South.
articles.content:
SURFSIDE,Fla. Anastasia Gromova met her friend Michelle Anna Pazos when they were juniors at McGill University in Montreal, Canada.
